properties.question: In the treatment of acute diarrhoea in adults and children, what is the primary goal of oral and intravenous rehydration therapy?
properties.option_a: To induce vomiting and reduce stomach contents
properties.option_b: To replace lost fluids and electrolytes
properties.option_c: To stimulate appetite and improve digestion
properties.option_d: To administer antibiotics directly into the bloodstream
